subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two days after scoring 62 points in a blowout victory over the Charlotte Bobcats, Carmelo Anthony had 35 hard-fought points as the Knicks edged the Lakers.
snippet: Two days after scoring 62 points in a blowout victory over the Charlotte Bobcats, Carmelo Anthony had 35 hard-fought points as the Knicks edged the Lakers.
